mapper.insert: insert into point_code (pc_code, pc_desc, pc_point) values (#{pc_code}, #{pc_desc}, #{pc_point})
insert into point_history (p_seq, m_id, pc_code) values (#{p_seq}, #{m_id}, #{pc_code})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select c.pc_desc, c.pc_point, h.p_seq, h.m_id, h.pc_code, h.p_date from point_code c, point_history h where c.pc_code = h.pc_code and h.m_id = #{m_id} order by h.p_date desc, h.p_seq desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from point_history where m_id = #{m_id}
